text: And as he spoke, the thought of Philip lying in the other room filled him with a revulsion that was homicidal. Even in that, his hands were tied. He dare not precipitate what might well be another coronary. And in that second he put back his professional mantle, and said with such icy politeness, such withdrawn bitterness, that Sandra withered before it:.
